Name: MegaRats
About the game: The planet is under attack by Giant Rats . We don't know where they came from, or why they're here. Help the citizens of Mega Rats defend their cities. Mega Rats is a fun filled and carefully crafted mix of fluid physical motion and hilarious Giant Rats . Mixing gameplay aspects of a First Person Shooter with a 3rd Person action adventure game , Mega Rats provides hours of fun . Explore the landscapes, discover cities, and defend the citizens, with full rigid body character physics in a large open world . Enjoy smooth character contro l while immersing yourself in the visceral soundtrack accompanying Mega Rats. Mega Rats can be played in VR ! Virtual Reality requires a supported Head Mounted Display (OSVR or SteamVR Compatible), but Mega Rats can also be played on 3D Televisions and regular 2D monitors.
